info.name: Barbarian Revisited
info.description: Content created by the Chisato Bailey
info.author: Chisato Bailey

description.p: Beginning at level three, while raging a barbarian may use their attack action to charge through the enemy’s line knocking their opponents aside or even smashing them to the ground.

While Raging; move up to 30 feet through enemy spaces. Each enemy takes 1d4 bludgeoning damage and must make a dexterity saving throw at DC {{barbarian:shove}} to keep from being either shoved one square or knocked prone (your choice). This action does not provoke opportunity attacks.

sheet.description: While Raging; move up to 30 feet through enemy spaces. Each enemy takes 1d4 bludgeoning damage and must make a dexterity saving throw at DC {{barbarian:shove}} to keep from being either shoved one square or knocked prone (your choice). This action does not provoke opportunity attacks.

description.p: Barbarians excel at maddening enemies until they make a mistake. You may Taunt up to 4 enemies. They must make a Wisdom saving throw at DC {{barbarian:taunt}} to resist mark. Marked foes must attack only you until succeeding on a save (minimum 1 turn).
In addition, one enemy within 15 feet will immediately charge the barbarian and make an attack at disadvantage. If this attack fails, the enemy is dazed for one turn.

sheet.description: - You may Taunt up to 4 enemies. They must make a Wisdom saving throw at DC {{barbarian:taunt}} to resist mark. Marked foes must attack only you until succeeding on a save (minimum 1 turn). You may choose one enemy within 15 feet of you to charge you. The opponent must make a melee attack at disadvantage. If the attack misses they are dazed for 1 turn.

description.p: Beginning at level 5, barbarians may charge their enemy before making an attack. Striking an opponent after this charge, pushes them back and possibly knocks them to the ground.

Move at least 10 feet and make a melee attack. If the attack hits, the target is shoved one space and must make either a strength or a dexterity (target's choice) saving throw at DC {{barbarian:shove}} to keep from being knocked prone.

sheet.description: Move at least 10 feet and make a melee attack. If the attack hits, the target is shoved one space and must make a dexterity saving throw at DC {{barbarian:shove}} to keep from being knocked prone.

description.p: Beginning at 7th level, a barbarian may choose to make a powerful sweeping attack in place of a normal attack striking multiple opponents at once.

sheet.description: Make a single attack that strikes up to 3 opponents adjacent to you. If the attack roll hits an enemy’s AC that enemy takes weapon damage only (do not add ability modifier).
